definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: A commentator in the China Daily said export curbs would encourage smuggling.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》评论员认为抑制出口会鼓励走私。

sentences.english: I have a China Daily and One Beijing Youth, please?
sentences.chinese: 给我来一份中国日报和北京青年好么？。

sentences.english: Last year, ‘China Daily’ launched a U.S. edition.
sentences.chinese: 去年，《中国日报》发行了其在北美销售的版本。

sentences.english: I write op-eds for GT's English edition (and China Daily).
sentences.chinese: 我给《环球时报》的英文版以及中国日报的专栏写稿。

sentences.english: "Nothing is certain right now, " Liu said to the China Daily.
sentences.chinese: “没有什么是一定的，现在，”刘说，以中国日报。

sentences.english: I have got two articles In English published in China Dally.
sentences.chinese: 我有两篇英语文章发表在《中国日报》上。

sentences.english: I often read China Daily so as to improve my reading.
sentences.chinese: 我常读《中国日报》以提高我的阅读。

sentences.english: The state-run China Daily headlined: "False charges deter lending elderly hand."
sentences.chinese: 国营的中国日报标题说“诬陷之舌挡住了援助之手”。

sentences.english: He writes exclusively for China Daily.
China Daily newspaper said she was found guilty of intentional assault but not penalized.
sentences.chinese: 中国日报说她被判故意伤害罪成立但免于处罚。

sentences.english: I have got two articles in English published in China Daily.
sentences.chinese: 我有两篇英语文章发表在《中国日报》上。

sentences.english: By the way, as we have never met I must tell you home to identify me: I am of 165cm tall and have a long hair. In addition, I will wear a white skirt and carry a China Daily at hand.
sentences.chinese: 另外我会穿一件白色的裙子，手上拿一份中国日报。

sentences.english: I have got two articles in English pulished in China Daily.
sentences.chinese: 我有两篇英语文章发表在《中国日报》上。

sentences.english: I like to read China Daily on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在回家的途中阅读《中国日报》。

sentences.english: The China Daily has decreased in size, but not in quality.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》版面已缩小，但质量并未降低。

sentences.english: The state-run China Daily headlined: “False charges deter lending elderly hand.
sentences.chinese: 国营的中国日报标题说“诬陷之舌挡住了援助之手”。

definition: online version of the People's Daily, 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4]
Wen Wei Po (Hong Kong newspaper)/Wenhui News (Shanghai newspaper)
Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company
Beijing Review/also written 北京週報|北京周报
